title: Issues in Metaphysics
description:
This module will explore in depth some advanced topics in metaphysics. Some possible topics include whether similar things have universals in common,
whether time flows, whether past and future exist, whether a whole is something over and above the sum of its parts, whether chance is objective, whether there are other possible worlds, and whether numbers, gods, or chairs and tables exist.
prerequisite: Completed 80MCs, including 28 MCs in PH, with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track.
